name: Shadow Rover
description:
NASA is building the VIPER rover to look for ice in permanently shadowed lunar craters. Check out this simulation and see how much ice you can find before your time runs out.  Remember: VIPER is solar powered, so don't spend too long in the shadows.  

This game was built as part of an education program (see credits in game).

Visit SciGames.org for more interactive experiences from the Space Science Institute.
